rooms.description: Spacious entrance with foyer featuring floor-to-ceiling windows to allow natural light.
Mediterranean-themed open plan space combining living area, dining area, and kitchen with floor-to-ceiling windows for panoramic views.
Master bedroom with en-suite bathroom designed with Mediterranean elements and large windows for daylight.
Secondary bedroom featuring floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light.
Additional bedroom with Mediterranean decor and ample window space.
Common bathroom serving multiple bedrooms, designed per local building norms.

openings.description: Large front door with reinforced glass for security and aesthetics.
Floor-to-ceiling rear window providing enhanced natural lighting and ventilation.
